Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Exceedingly \Ex*ceed"ing*ly\, adv. To a very great degree; beyond what is usual; surpassingly. It signifies more than very. [1913 Webster]
exceedingly adv : to an extreme degree or extent; "his eyesight was exceedingly defective" [syn: {passing}, {extremely}]
